meanings.definition: A person who strives for perfection in their work or activities.
meanings.sent1: She is a perfectionist when it comes to her drawings.
meanings.sent2: The perfectionists in the group always double-check their work.
meanings.sent3: The perfectionists in the kitchen made sure every dish was flawless.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation as a perfectionist spread like wildfire in the office.
meanings.sent5: The perfectionists' attention to detail was unmatched.

meanings.definition: Those who have high standards and expectations for themselves and others.
meanings.sent1: The perfectionists in the team never settle for anything less than the best.
meanings.sent2: As perfectionists, they expect nothing but excellence from everyone.
meanings.sent3: The perfectionists at the party made sure everything was just right.
meanings.sent4: In their eyes, the perfectionists saw room for improvement everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The perfectionists' dedication to perfection inspired others.
